LanguageData.ARS_ConfirmRemoveFolderDesc: Do you really want to remove this folder ? all contained saves will be removed too !
LanguageData.ARS_ToolTipMoveSave: Move this save to another folder
LanguageData.ARS_ToolTipDelFolder: Delete the current save folder, all contained saves will be destroyed !
LanguageData.ARS_WarningFileMoveAlreadyExist: There is already a "{0}" save in the destination folder, the save had been renamed "{1}"
